Posted By: Atali (1/29/2012 2:27:43 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
When I was first looking at this card, I thought, "So it's normally a [Stave Off](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stave Off) for a creature I control, but it becomes [Brave the Elements](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Brave the Elements) when I have 5 or less life? That's pretty solid, I'll probably run this over [Stave Off](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Stave Off) in my Humans deck."  
  
Then I saw that it said target **permanent** I control.  
  
**Then** I saw that the Fateful Hour ability gives **me** protection too.  
  
Wow. Just wow. I'll definitely be looking forward to running this!
posts.html:

Then I saw that the Fateful Hour ability gives me protection too.

Wow. Just wow. I'll definitely be looking forward to running this!
